cards.name: Blazing Dragon
cards.ability: When this card destroys a monster, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Tidal Serpent
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can return one spell card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Gale Falcon
cards.ability: This card can attack directly if your opponent controls no monsters.

cards.name: Granite Golem
cards.ability: This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 2000 or less ATK.

cards.name: Stormcaller Mage
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to destroy one spell/trap on the field.

cards.name: Shadow Reaper
cards.ability: When this card destroys a monster by battle, banish that monster instead of sending it to the graveyard.

cards.name: Radiant Angel
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, gain 1000 life points.

cards.name: Void Specter
cards.ability: This card cannot be targeted by card effects.

cards.name: Inferno Knight
cards.ability: This card gains 300 ATK for each Fire monster in your graveyard.

cards.name: Abyssal Leviathan
cards.ability: This card can attack twice per battle phase.

cards.name: Whirlwind Fox
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed by battle, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Obsidian Colossus
cards.ability: This card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

cards.name: Thunderstorm Drake
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, destroy one face-up monster on the field.

cards.name: Necrotic Assassin
cards.ability: When this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate trap cards until the end of the damage step.

cards.name: Celestial Guardian
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can negate the activation of a spell card and destroy it.

cards.name: Rift Walker
cards.ability: This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has higher ATK.

cards.name: Pyroclasm Phoenix
cards.ability: If this card is destroyed, you can special summon 1 Fire monster from your deck.

cards.name: Frostbite Kraken
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can change one attack position monster to defense position.

cards.name: Zephyr Hawk
cards.ability: When this card is normal summoned, you can return one spell/trap to the hand.

cards.name: Crystal Sentinel
cards.ability: When this card is summoned, you can set one trap card directly from your deck.

cards.name: Volcanic Titan
cards.ability: If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate monster effects until the end of the Damage Step.

cards.name: Tsunami Oracle
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to negate the effect of a Trap Card.

cards.name: Cyclone Falcon
cards.ability: If this card destroys a monster by battle, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WIND monster from your Deck.

cards.name: Quake Mammoth
cards.ability: Unaffected by Spell Cards.

cards.name: Stormbringer Sorcerer
cards.ability: When this card is Summoned, destroy all face-up Spell/Trap Cards on the field.

cards.name: Dread Phantom
cards.ability: If this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can banish 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard.

cards.name: Solar Paladin
cards.ability: This card gains 300 ATK for each LIGHT monster in your Graveyard.

cards.name: Nullifier Wraith
cards.ability: Cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects.

cards.name: Ember Knight
cards.ability: If this card battles a WATER monster, it gains 1000 ATK during damage calculation.

cards.name: Abyss Diver
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed by battle, add 1 WATER monster from your Deck to your hand.

cards.name: Skybound Archer
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Boulder Guardian
cards.ability: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 2500 or less ATK.

cards.name: Thunderclap Wyvern
cards.ability: If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate monster effects until the end of the Damage Step.

cards.name: Nightshade Assassin
cards.ability: When this card destroys a monster by battle, you can Special Summon 1 DARK monster from your hand.

cards.name: Luminous Sage
cards.ability: Once per turn, you can reveal 1 LIGHT monster in your hand to draw 1 card.

cards.name: Voidshift Specter
cards.ability: If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate any cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step.

cards.name: Magma Berserker
cards.ability: This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

cards.name: Deepsea Serpent
cards.ability: Unaffected by Trap Cards.

cards.name: Gale Ninja
cards.ability: If this card is attacked, you can return it to your hand instead of destroying it.

cards.name: Ironclad Behemoth
cards.ability: Cannot be Special Summoned. Must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 monsters.
